title: Hoodie Squad Placement Test
description: Discover which Hoodie squad aligns with your personality and skills!

questions.text: When you see a new meme coin trending, your first instinct is to:

options.text: Create memes and content about it
Research the tokenomics and team
Share it with your community and hype it up
Analyze the chart and look for entry points
Do a bit of everything - research, create, and trade

questions.text: Your ideal Web3 project would be:

options.text: Building an NFT collection with unique art
Creating a research platform for alpha
Hosting community events and building hype
Developing trading strategies and tools
A platform that combines multiple aspects of Web3

questions.text: In a group project, you naturally take on the role of:

options.text: The creative designer/artist
The researcher and analyst
The communicator and motivator
The strategist and executor
The versatile team player who can fill any role

questions.text: Your favorite type of content to consume is:

options.text: Art tutorials and creative inspiration
Deep-dive analysis and research papers
Community discussions and podcasts
Trading strategies and market updates
A mix of everything - variety keeps me engaged

questions.text: When you discover alpha, you prefer to:

options.text: Create visual content to explain it
Verify and research it thoroughly
Share it with your network immediately
Act on it quickly and strategically
Combine multiple approaches - research, create, and act

questions.text: Your biggest strength in Web3 is:

options.text: Creating unique and engaging content
Finding hidden gems and opportunities
Building and engaging communities
Executing trades and strategies
Being adaptable and learning across different areas

creators.name: üé® Hoodie Creators
creators.description: You're a creative force in the Web3 ecosystem! Your squad focuses on building, creating, and innovating. You excel at creating unique content, designing NFTs, and bringing creative visions to life.

decoders.name: üß† Hoodie Decoders
decoders.description: You're an analytical mind who loves to dig deep! Your squad specializes in research, analysis, and understanding market dynamics. You excel at finding alpha, analyzing trends, and uncovering hidden opportunities.

speakers.name: üé§ Hoodie Speakers
speakers.description: You're a natural communicator and community builder! Your squad focuses on communication, influence, and building engaged communities. You excel at hosting events, creating hype, and fostering connections.

raiders.name: ‚öîÔ∏è Hoodie Raiders
raiders.description: You're a strategic warrior in the Web3 battlefield! Your squad specializes in trading, strategizing, and navigating market opportunities. You excel at executing trades, managing risk, and capitalizing on market movements.

rangers.name: ü¶Ö Hoodie Rangers
rangers.description: You're a versatile generalist who thrives on variety! Your squad embraces the full spectrum of Web3 activities. You excel at adapting to different roles, learning across multiple domains, and bringing diverse perspectives to projects.
